<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=64)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 178 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Whether you study to further your own ambitions or simply out of fascination with the intricacies of language, your way with words is unparalleled.
